dict.string: The ABBOTT commitment to build Canadian knowledge and foster innovation in rheumatology encompasses numerous unique initiatives. Which of the following pairs is not a part of this?

array.string: The Colour of Communication / Power of Movement
Treat to Target / The Collaboration of SpA: A Multidiciplinary Approach

dict.string: Through the use of CHE accredited programs, which ABBOTT initiative is designed to address communication gaps between rheumatologists and patients, as well as between allied HCPs and patients?

Which accredited CHE program strives to develop ways to streamline the referral process for SpA patients and coordinate care in a more comprehensive and collaborative fashion within other speciailites?

array.string: The Collaboration of SpA: A Multidiciplinary Approach

dict.string: An overarching principle of the Treat to Target initiative is to maximize long-term, health-related quality of life. Which is not an aspect of this international task force pursuit?

array.string: Normalization of function and social participation

dict.string: MyHealthMyFuture.ca is a website for RA, AS and PsA patients. It helps to answer important questions that patients may be reluctant to ask, while providing online advice from Canadian experts in rheumatology and psychology. Which of the following is not offered on the website?

array.string: Advice on building a treatment plan

dict.string: With the Arthritis Society of Canada serving as an educational partner, Abbott is raising awareness of inflammatory disease through a high-impact, direct-to-consumer poster and ad campaign under the title of...

array.string: Together We Can Fight the Fire

dict.string: Abbott is the presenting sponsor of The Power of Movement, an effort to raise awareness of inflammatory disease. At the heart of this effort lies the world's largest challenge involving...
